Title: Relates to instituting internet service neutrality
Summary: Relates to instituting internet service neutrality; provides the public service commission with jurisdiction over monitoring broadband internet service providers; requires a certification for internet service neutrality in certain state contracts.
LawCode: Amd Art 11 Art Head, §§212 & 215, add §231, Pub Serv L; add §148, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the state finance law, in relation to instituting internet service neutrality
